description:
eWeather and News is designed for exhibition mode, but will also work as a standalone app. Using your GPS location or manual input, it will give you the current weather conditions, current time, and let you choose between displaying your local 3-day forecast or displaying a local/national news feed. It refreshes hourly.

This app requires data services.

v-->1.9.9 made ui compatible with all webos devices

NOTE: IF YOU ARE UPDATING THE APP, YOU WILL NEED TO TOGGLE EXHIBITION MODE OFF AND BACK ON TO GET THE SCENE TO LOAD CORRECTLY.
